Row.Help: +25% Combat Bonus when fighting adjacent to a friendly unit.

Set.Text: The Legion is the Roman unique unit, replacing the Swordsman. The Legion is more powerful than the Swordsman, esspesually when fighting next to other units, making it the most powerful melee unit of the Classical Era. The Legion can also construct roads and forts and is the only non-Worker unit able to do so.

Strong, front-line land Unit of the Classical Era. Only the Romans may build it. This Unit has a promotion that boosts [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength when adjecent to friendly units and has a higher [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength than the Swordsman, which it replaces.
